meanings.sent1: The cecropias in the jungle provide shade for many animals.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of cecropias while hiking in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys love to swing from the cecropias, pretending they are kings of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The cecropias stood tall like guardians, protecting the smaller plants below.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the cecropias danced in the breeze, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'cecropia', referring to multiple trees of this type.
meanings.sent1: Many cecropias lined the path, forming a natural canopy above.
meanings.sent2: Explorers marveled at the vast expanse of cecropias in the untouched wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The cecropias whispered secrets to each other in the wind, causing mischief among the forest creatures.
meanings.sent4: The cecropias stood together like a united army, ready to face any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The rustling of the cecropias filled the air with a soothing melody, calming all who listened.
